name: appSage
description: app**Sage** is a no-code web document builder.

scripts.package: electron-packager . appSage --platform=win32 --arch=x64,arm64 --out=release/${npm_package_version}/ --overwrite && electron-packager . appSage --platform=darwin --arch=x64,arm64 --out=release/${npm_package_version}/ --overwrite && electron-packager . appSage --platform=linux --arch=x64,arm64 --out=release/${npm_package_version}/ --overwrite
